room_title: Escape room "Hostage" by Breakout Games - Oklahoma City in Oklahoma City
review: Had a great time with my family here! Liz was an awesome Game Master and the Hostage room was alot of fun. Will be coming back here for sure.

room_title: Escape room "Hostage" by Breakout Games - Oklahoma City in Oklahoma City
review: We did the hostage room and it was so much fun. This is one of the best escape places in OKC. You have to check them out, we can't wait to do more!

room_title: Escape room "Hostage" by Breakout Games - Oklahoma City in Oklahoma City
review: Our group of 7 worked together to breakout. Not too obscure or subtle of clues. Hints helpful. Fun time.

room_title: Escape room "Hostage" by Breakout Games - Oklahoma City in Oklahoma City
review: It was super fun and the staff is very friendly. We beat the hostage situation in 55 minutes and had a blast. We definitely be going back soon.

room_title: Escape room "Hostage" by Breakout Games - Oklahoma City in Oklahoma City
review: We have done all the breakout games now. We just escaped from Hostage. These are so much fun. I highly recommend them to anyone. We didn't get out of Kidnapping or Casino so we are going to do them until we breakout of those! Looking forward to the new Island Escape
